remove_these.splash_screen: Browser will use name, background_color, and icons for the loading/splash_screen
remove_these.name: Used when the app is installed, typically shows on splash screen
remove_these.short_name: Shown on the user's home screen, launcher, or other places where space is limited
remove_these.description: Similar length to og:description. Used alongside the screenshots for install prompts
remove_these.background_color: Background color of the splash screen before app loads. Typically same color as your app background
remove_these.shortcuts: When user long-presses app icon in mobile, entries here will show as dropdown items. Useful for quick tasks
remove_these.start_url: Url at which the app should start
remove_these.scope: If user goes outside scope, normal browser window is used. e.g. /app => /app/item-1 inside, /pages is outside scope
remove_these.screenshots: Shown in the install prompt on mobile

name: Vite Configuration Template
description: Compilation of settings for a vite project.
